name: Just Like The Simulations
description:
Simulation Tool for FFXIV

This simulator is designed to be played on mobile phones!

https://www.patreon.com/justlikethesimulations

https://twitter.com/IchigoChidori

https://twitter.com/pettanko__neko

https://www.twitch.tv/pettanko_neko

Extra info:
Wormhole doesn't account for hurting other 'players', only you!
Cruise Chaser doesn't actually cleave or do damage, but will teleport and dash correctly.
When playing with touchscreen controls, the camera control only rotates side-to-side.
